RMI.RMIBase

类 SDRemoteConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • RMI.RMIBase.SDRemoteConnection
  • 直接已知子类:
    SDInvokeRemoteConnection, SDServerResponseConnection

    public abstract class SDRemoteConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by amaliujia on 14-12-23.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void close()
      Close function to close current connection
      void marshalling(java.lang.Class<?> type, java.lang.Object value, java.io.ObjectOutputStream out)
      Marshalling function, used to send parameters for one RMI
      java.lang.Object unmarshalling(java.lang.Class<?> type, java.io.ObjectInputStream in)
      Unmarshalling function, used ot extract return result of one RMI.
